import React from 'react' import { Navbar,Container,Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const userLog=useSelector(state=>state.userLog) const {userInfo}=userLog function handleLogout(){ } return (
E-shop
 Cart {userInfo?(  {userInfo.name}):(  Signin)}
) } export default Header
